```{r sessionInfo}

pkg_session <-
  devtools::session_info(pkgs = "ThesisPackage")[2] %>%
  plyr::ldply(.data = .) %>%
  dplyr::select(package, ondiskversion, date, source) %>%
  setNames(object = ., nm = c("Package", "Version", "Date", "Source"))

if (knitr_chunk == "latex") {
  knitr::kable(
    x = pkg_session, format = knitr_chunk, longtable = TRUE, escape = TRUE,
    caption = "\\texttt{ThesisPackage} R session info."
  ) %>%
    kableExtra::column_spec(column = 1, border_left = TRUE) %>%
    kableExtra::column_spec(column = 4, border_right = TRUE) %>%
    kableExtra::kable_styling(
      latex_options = c("hold_position", "repeat_header"),
      repeat_header_text = "Continued.",
      repeat_header_method = "replace",
      font_size = 8
    )
}
```
